A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Well let's see. Luke was portrayed as a coward. He was going to murder Ben Solo because he was scared of him. He exhausted himself and instead of resting he just\, what\, died? Really? Rey is now a Jedi master apparently despite having no training. No real character development on Poe or Finn. Kylo still doesn't have a clue what he wants. Snoke\, this big bad Force user\, is snuffed out like he was nothing and we still don't know who he was or where he came from. Rey's parents were nobodies? She couldn't have been a Palpatine or Kenobi? Something\, you know\, actually interesting? The entire sub plot of trying to shut off the hyper space tracker was utterly pointless and a waste of time. The space chase was absurd. Ugh. Just\, ugh. This film was horribly written\, the story was dumb\, the characters lifeless. This wasn't Star Wars.
